TopicTitle: Game suddenly crashes with unity error screen

Articles.Content:
My game crashes when im flying in the atmosphere randomly. Ive had 3 total crashes recently and they were all  while i was flying. 

It doesnt crash immediately and it happenes after sometime i fly. Crash i just had happened after 5min of flying. Crash i had previously happened after 30 min of flying.

 

I just discovered another issue where my game screen just freezes but the sound still works. When i press esc it mutes the sound just like normal game, when i press esc again the sound comes back on.

So the game is running fine but only the screen freezes? What could be causing this issue?

Here's the list of my loaded DLL's

I searched up this problem and saw that razer synapse could cause this. I deactivated it but the crash still happened.

I'm running MSI Afterburner with RTSS overlay and windows Gamebar overlay. All the mods, windows, and graphics driver is up to date.

Tried deactivating RTSS too. It still happened tho.

Edited May 14, 2020 by One eyed Smile
added some more information about new issue

Game freezes but sound continues? Big list of d3d11 errors at the point of crash with gradually reducing numbers? This is exactly the same as the crashes I was having a few months ago. The solution for me was to update my graphics card drivers, that completely resolved the problem and it hasn’t reoccurred since, try updating your graphics drivers and see if it also works for you.

So I had the same problem. My screen freezes and then it turns black and then I return to the desktop with a little error window with a kerbal on it. The error in that window was     Unity 2019.2.2f1_ab112815d860. I tried various things and nothing worked. I also contacted the support so I'm curious for their answer. Then I installed an older version of my graphics card driver (I've got a Radeon RX590) that was released in December last year. And until now the game didn't crash anymore. But I'm gonna test it a few more times to be completely sure. It seems that Radeon gpus and the latest Radeon drivers have some issue with KSP, but I'm no expert. But it would explain why (at least in my case) the game crashed regardless of the graphics settings or if it's stock or modded or at the beginning of the game or in the middle of it. I can't say that this way of solving the issue works with Nvidia gpus too, since I don't have any.
I don't think its guz ov lot mods its maybe one mod crashing you it happened to me i have had 59 mods 1 crashing me soo or maybe one is outdated version..
